client_uid.description: The unique identifier (UID) of the client

opt_out_transactional_sms.description: The opt out status of the client for transactional SMS messages

preferred_language.description: The client's preferred language code (e.g., 'en', 'he', 'es'). Can be null if not set.

effective_language.description: The effective language used for the client, taking into account business defaults if preferred_language is not set

created_at.description: Timestamp when the settings were created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the settings were last updated

description: Client-level settings such as communication preferences and opt-outs.
